overview: Mr. Oâ€™Hara is a Managing Director of OEP and has over 20 years of operating experience. Prior to joining OEP, Mr. Oâ€™Hara served as Executive Vice President of Worldspan and was a member of its Board of Directors. Prior to this, he was a management partner advising Citicorp Venture Capital and Ontario Teachers Pension Plan; served as Senior Vice President of Sabre; and worked in various capacities for Perot Systems. Mr. Oâ€™Hara currently serves on the Boards of Carlson Wagonlit Travel, Travel Acquisitions Group, and Travelport. Mr. Oâ€™Hara holds an MBA from Vanderbilt University.
